ttl.name: WIRELESS DOOR LOCK CONTROL SYSTEM (w/ Theft Deterrent System)

s-1.ptxt: CUSTOMIZE WIRELESS DOOR LOCK CONTROL SYSTEM

item.ptxt: The following items can be customized.
During customize mode, the alarm control functions are disabled.
During customize mode, the following wireless control functions are disabled: remote alarm function, automatic locking function, operation stop function and illuminated entry function.
During customize mode, the ECU will not output lock/unlock signals.
While in customize mode, if the key is inserted into the ignition key cylinder or a door is opened, customize mode will be canceled.
When the customer requests a change in a function, first make sure that the function can be customized.
Record the current settings before customizing.

entry.ptxt: Function that makes the hazard warning lights and side turn signal lights flash and security horn assembly sound for answer-back when the door control transmitter assembly lock/unlock switch pressed
Only hazard warning lights and side turn signal lights flash, Hazard warning lights and side turn signal lights flash and security horn assembly sounds or OFF
If door is not completely closed and the lock switch on door control transmitter assembly is pressed, this function sounds security horn assembly for 1 second

s3.ptxt: Check that the following conditions are met.

item.ptxt: No key is in the ignition key cylinder.
The theft deterrent system is in the disarmed state (when either condition below is met):
All the doors are in the unlocked condition and the doors are locked and unlocked using the door control transmitter assembly.
The key is inserted into the ignition key cylinder, the ignition switch is turned to ON then off, and then the key is removed.
The driver side door is opened (the other doors are closed).

s3.ptxt: Perform the following operation twice within 5 seconds:

item.ptxt: Insert the key into the ignition key cylinder, and then pull it out (ending with the key pulled out).

s3.ptxt: After completing the above step, press and hold down lock switch and unlock switch on the door control transmitter assembly at the same time for over 3 seconds within 5 seconds.
Check that the hazard warning lights flash once.
After completing the lock and unlock switch operation, perform the following operation within 5 seconds.

item.ptxt: Press the lock switch on door control transmitter assembly once within 2seconds.

s3.ptxt: After completing the above step, press the unlock switch on door control transmitter assembly once within 2 seconds.
Check that the hazard warning lights flash once.
After completing the unlock switch operation, perform the following operations (mode select) within 10 seconds:

item.ptxt: Press the lock switch on door control transmitter assembly the number of times shown below depending on the desired function behavior to select the answer-back pattern and warning function setting. Press the unlock switch on door lock transmitter once within 2 seconds of pressing the lock switch on door control transmitter assembly.
Wireless Answer-back Function: Only hazard warning lights and side turn signal lights flash
Door Ajar Warning Function: ON
Press the lock switch on door control transmitter assembly once.
Wireless Answer-back Function: Hazard warning lights and side turn signal lights flash and security horn assembly sounds
Door Ajar Warning Function: ON
Press the lock switch on door control transmitter assembly twice.
Wireless Answer-back Function: OFF
Door Ajar Warning Function: OFF
Press the lock switch on door control transmitter assembly 3 times.

s3.ptxt: Check the response to the customize operation.

entry.ptxt: Only hazard warning lights and side turn signal lights flash
Hazard warning lights and side turn signal lights flash and security horn assembly sounds
